Description.Text: All rooms decorated with elegant furnishing and style, upholstery and colours, lamps and curtains. Each room has different style and luxurious bathroom.All rooms are equipped with air-conditioning, TV, telephone, fridge, hairdryer, balcony with sea view.

Hotel is situated at Vlicho Bay, a few meters from Geni settlement, 2 km from Nidri and 1 km from Desimi Beach.Sea front: 0 m , Vlicho Port: 700 m, Taverns and Restaurants: 300 m, Mini market: 300 m, Beach: 1km, Lefkada: 20km
